EmailTemplate.description: Notification to customer for Service Report
EmailTemplate.name: Service Report Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Service Report - {{{WorkOrder.WorkOrderNumber}}}{{{WorkOrder.Customer_Reference__c}}}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear customer,
Good news! The service report for your recent intervention is available.
You will find the key details in the PDF attached to this email.
Thank you for your trust!
Kind regards,
{{{WorkOrder.Name_Contract_Manager__c}}}
{{{WorkOrder.Mobile_Contract_Manager__c}}}
[Image alt text: Logo]
Please consider the environment before printing this email
Krinkels Greencare nv- RPR Brussel – BE 0457 071 225 - Rue Emile Pathéstraat 410, 1190 Bruxelles/Brussel
